channel.title: Web3 Security Paper Digest

item.title: TxRay: Agentic Postmortem of Live Blockchain Attacks
item.description:
Summary

  • TxRay is an LLM-driven agentic postmortem system that reconstructs DeFi 'Anyone-Can-Take' (ACT) attacks from one or more seed transactions, recovering exploit lifecycles and root causes.
  • It generates runnable, self-contained Proofs-of-Concept (PoCs) with executable semantic oracles to deterministically reproduce incidents and self-check correctness.
  • The authors introduce PoCEvaluator, an independent agentic execution-and-review evaluator, and report 92.11% end-to-end reproduction on 114 DeFiHackLabs incidents, with median validated root causes and PoCs produced in 40 and 59 minutes respectively.
  • TxRay yields higher-quality PoCs (98.1% avoid hard-coded attacker addresses) and improved coverage versus prior tools (15.6% and 65.5% gains over STING and APE).

Paper Type

  • Research

Additional Information

  • Authors: ['Ziyue Wang', 'Jiangshan Yu', 'Kaihua Qin', 'Dawn Song', 'Arthur Gervais', 'Liyi Zhou']
  • Tags: ['smart-contract-security', 'DeFi-exploit-analysis', 'automated-postmortem', 'LLM-security-agent']

item.title: SPEAR: An Engineering Case Study of Multi-Agent Coordination for Smart Contract Auditing
item.description:
Summary

  • Introduces SPEAR, a multi-agent system for smart contract auditing with specialized agents (Planning, Execution, Repair) that use risk-aware heuristics, the Contract Net protocol, and a programmatic-first repair policy.
  • Agents maintain AGM-compliant belief revision, coordinate via negotiation/auction protocols, and dynamically revise plans to recover from brittle generated artifacts.
  • Presents an empirical study comparing the multi-agent design against centralized and pipeline baselines under controlled failure scenarios, measuring coordination, recovery behavior, and resource usage.

Paper Type

  • Research

Additional Information

  • Authors: ['Arnab Mallick', 'Indraveni Chebolu', 'Harmesh Rana']
  • Tags: ['smart-contract-auditing', 'multi-agent-systems', 'automated-repair', 'vulnerability-detection', 'software-engineering']
